title.tagline: Driven by curiosity, seeking value and detailed information online.

shopping_behavior.search_style: Prefers searching for 'Best Product' or 'First Product' to quickly identify options.
shopping_behavior.price_sensitivity: Primarily price-conscious, seeking the cheapest product but willing to pay for quality if warranted.
shopping_behavior.decision_style: Balances price with reviews and specifications, carefully considering product details to ensure suitability.

persona.narrative: The Research Explorer is a curious and driven individual, frequently exploring product pages with a focus on detailed information.  They value efficiency and value, leading them to prioritize price and customer reviews while simultaneously seeking high-quality products to fulfill their academic and personal interests.  This persona demonstrates a high level of product exploration and actively seeks out product information.
